title: [Large-Scale] Critical Thinking and Language Expression Enhancement Program Through Digital Role-Playing Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency (grammar/vocabulary comprehension and fundamental writing skills) and experience with digital devices, ability to perform simple text analysis and understand narrative texts
context.additional_context: A Program for Elementary School Teachers and Pre-Service Teachers Aiming to Strengthen Language-Related Job Competencies. Applying a Blended Teaching Methodology Combining Game-Based Learning and Real-Time Interaction. Focusing on Improving Learners' Linguistic Fluency, Critical Reading Skills, and Especially Inference-Based Reading and Contextual Expression Abilities Through In-Game Dialogue Simulations

learning_goals: Learners improve logical reasoning and text analysis skills by ≥30% through scenario resolution in digital role-playing games, acquiring reading comprehension strategies utilizing narrative contexts within games

Learners develop critical evaluation skills to analyze multiple perspectives in in-game decision-making processes, master context-appropriate vocabulary selection, and enhance contextual expression abilities through character dialogue simulations

Learners increase learning motivation scores by ≥25% compared to pre-assessments through game-based learning, improving expression, reading comprehension, and particularly inferential reading skills via in-game dialogue simulations

resources: Custom Educational Digital Game Developed with RPG Maker

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
